item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Transfers
item.description:
This solution lets you add transfer options from hotels and nearby airports to your hotel shopping flow with minimum effort. What does it do? We use the Hotel geolocation to identify nearby airports, look for available transfers with our connected providers and return them in the Quote response, within the GraphQL Extensions section. How to implement it? As a Buyer, you’ll need to be connected to our latest API, Hotel-X.
[...]
